page.title: 16WELFORD-ON-AVON SCHOOL
page.content:
Welford school was opened in 1852. There are 4 classes and 160 children, ranging from 5-11.We also have a nursery which takes children age 3-5. Our playground has an area of roughly 791.35m and the grass section is 30.5*10.2 metres and 86*36 metres in one place. There are ten people on the parents committee.There is 1 headmaster, 5 teachers,1 full time helper,1 part time helper,2 cleaning staff,2 kitchen ladies and,3 lunchtime supervisors. There are also 9 members on the guverning body. We have a swimming pool which we use during the Summer term.
by RHODRI, MARK, PAUL & SIMON
